name: KIMBO Design Inc.
description:
KIMBO Design Inc. is a creative agency. We specialize in integrated communications for both print and web. As an award-winning agency, KIMBO Design builds brand value through visual and digital storytelling. With our clean and modern signature style, we produce effective and sustainable solutions.
KIMBO Design provides a host of creative services specializing in digital strategy, custom website design and development, interactive advertising campaigns and communications design.
